summary: Play as the Savage She-Hulk or Red She-Hulk.
descriptionHtml:
Builds Are OP and recomanded for use with Deadly Dragons and Wars in Skyrim mods.

She-Hulk: Start Game in River Wood

Begining Stats 

Health 200
Stamina 200
Magika 0
Double Stamina Regen
Double Health Regen
Double Combat Health Regen
Poison Resist 100% 
Fire Resist 50%
Frost Resist 50%
Unamred Damage 20 (Double Khajiit unarmed) 
Carry Weight 400
Two Handed 25
One Handed 25

Abilties(Since the charecter does not use magika I gave her the following)

Adrenaline Rush: Stamina regenerates 10x faster for 60 seconds.
Berserker Rage: You take half damage and do double damage for 60 seconds.
Histskin: Invoke the power of the Hist to recover health ten times faster for 60 seconds.
Battle Cry: Targets flee for 30 seconds.

If you need to reload the stats please place the Hulk.txt file in the Data folder then in game click tilde-key (~) then type \"bat\" space \"hulk\" and hit enter.


She Rulk (Red She-Hulk): Start Game outside Riften with the quest to kill Grelod the Kind.
****The Vigilants of Stendarr will attack you on sight****Think she is a Daedra

Begining Stats

Health 175
Stamina 175
Magika 125
1.5 times Regen
1.5 times Health Regen
1.5 times Combat Health Regen
Poison Resist 50% 
Fire Resist 75%
Frost Resist 0%
Magika Resist 25%
Unamred Damage 10 (same Khajiit unarmed) 
Carry Weight 350
Two Handed 30
One Handed 30
Sneak 30
Weapon Swings 25% faster then She-Hulk (Tried 50% but was to fast)

Abilties(Different from She-hulk)
Savage Strike: Standing power attacks do 25% bonus damage with a chance to decapitate your enemies
Adrenaline Rush: Stamina regenerates 10x faster for 60 seconds.
Histskin: Invoke the power of the Hist to recover health ten times faster for 60 seconds.
Dragonskin: Absorb 50% of the magicka from hostile spells for 60 seconds.

Ancestor\'s Wrath: For 60 seconds, opponents that get too close take 8 points per second of fire damage.(Since she gives of radiation)

If you need to reload the stats please place the Hulk.txt file in the Data folder then in game click tilde-key (~) then type \"bat\" space \"sherulk\" and hit enter.



Here is the rundown of the mods needed.
>>>Body: 
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

>>>Color: 
Extended Slider Colors by Expired
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923

>>>Charecter Size: 
Increased charater height by Kacemus
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3265

>>>Hair
Coolsims Hair Retexture by Bloodysunday
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4400

>>>Skimpy Foraworn Armor
Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE V2 Armor Set -Work In Progress- by Killer Keo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654

>>>Amazon Scaled Armor
Amazon armor scale replacer by Foxtrotone
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3521

>>>Assasin Outfit
Triss Armor Retextured by Psyke23 and oldholo
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4708

 
>>>Boost Unarmed Stats - Take your pick from the 2 below
Unarmed Combat by Eldiran
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4822

Unarmed Enhanced by ErikRedbeard
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6726

>>>Unarmed scaling at Level up
Auto Unarmed Scaling by Takikun
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3517

>>>Unarmed weapons hand wraps and gloves
Enchantable and Upgradeable Unarmed Strikes by Rlyeh Liberation Front
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5319


(Optional) Since she Hulk is Over powered I recommend the mods below to make the game more fun and challenging.

>>>Wars in Skyrim IV - Dark Age - difficulty 5 - MAX difficulty
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6176
>>>Deadly Dragon Mod - Default difficulty
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3829

I would like to thank the makers of the mods used.

If you enjoy this please vote or endorse or give credit.
author: JayZeli
